document_data.mainbody:
olos Guide to Monsters is a 5th-edition Dungeons & Dragons sourcebook that describes monster lore and lairs, playing monster character races, and gives the stat blocks of many monsters old and new.
__NOTOC__
* Preface
* Ch. 1 Monster Lore
* Ch. 2 Character Races
* Ch. 3 Bestiary
* App. A Assorted Beasts
* App. B Nonplayer Characters
* App. C Monster Lists
